docs.snippet: We must recognize that the horror of 1915 isn't the sum of our identity....
docs.lead_paragraph: We must recognize that the horror of 1915 isn't the sum of our identity.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by author Meline Toumani uses both gushing Armenian reaction to visit to country by Kim Kardashian and negative reception of her memoir as evidence that Armenians are letting 1915 genocide define them; suggests that upcoming centennial of genocide should serve as occasion for Armenians to look to future and to find meaningful ways to grow.

headline.main: We Armenians Shouldn’t Let Genocide Define Us
headline.print_headline: Armenians Shouldn't Let Genocide Define Us

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity

headline.main: Time Plus Distance Help Some Oklahoma City Victims Move On
headline.print_headline: Time Plus Distance Help Some Oklahoma City Victims Move On

docs.snippet: A motorcycle-riding suicide bomber attacked a line of people waiting outside a bank Saturday in eastern Afghanistan, killing at least 35 and wounding 125 in an assault the country's president blamed on the Islamic State group....

headline.main: Islamic State Blamed for Afghan Suicide Bombing Killing 35

docs.snippet: Children’s credit records are clean, and they don’t check their credit reports, two conditions data thieves take advantage of....
docs.lead_paragraph: Children’s credit records are clean, and they don’t check their credit reports, two conditions data thieves take advantage of.
docs.abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column observes that children are particularly attractive targets for identity theft because their credit reports are clean; notes difficulty for parents in shielding children from possible identity theft given that most do not have credit history.

headline.main: Identity Theft Poses Extra Troubles for Children
headline.print_headline: Identity Theft Poses Extra Risk for Children
